Entries.danceRejection: I can't. I'm the one in charge of the event.
Entries.Mon8: Oh, @! Hello.#$e#Today would be a nice day for a picnic, wouldn't you say?
Entries.Mon10: How have things been, @?#$e#I see you so often, yet I rarely remember to ask.$h
Entries.Tue10: Ah, if it isn't farmer @.#$e#Again.$h#$e#Do you have any business here?
Entries.Wed8: Nice to see you, @.#$e#We sure run into each other quite a lot, don't we?$h
Entries.Wed10: Is it just a coincidence that we always seem to meet here...?$s
Entries.Thu8: Ah... I'm not sure if you knew, but Marnie and I... we were sort of an item.#$e#We've separated.$s
Entries.Thu10: You look very nice today, Mr. @.$1^You look very nice today, Miss @.$1
Entries.Fri8: Some days being mayor feels very rewarding.#$e#Other days... well, I try not to think about those days.$s
Entries.Fri10: The whole town will be at the saloon tonight.#$e#I'll buy you a drink if you drop by.$1
Entries.Sat10: Last night sure was a doozy, eh?$h#$e#The saloon's always pretty crazy on Fridays.$h
Entries.Sun10: You're doing a great job, @.#$e#I'm very proud of the work you've done here in Pelican Town.$h#$e#And... I'm proud to call you my dear friend, too.$1
Entries.event_lewisBreakup1: I... I know. But I shouldn't have let myself get so close to y-- that person...$6
Entries.event_lewisBreakup2: ...Maybe a little.$5#$b#Still... no one deserves that.$s
Entries.event_lewisBreakup3: Um... it's... it's not important. Maybe I'll tell you later...$s
Entries.event_lewisMorning1: Oh, well it's nice to see you! Actually, it's strange you happened by...#$b#I was just thinking about how I wanted to speak to you.
Entries.event_lewisMorning2: Oh! Is that so?$8#$b#Well... actually, now that you're here, there's something I wanted to talk to you about.
Entries.event_lewisMorning3: Oh... could you spare just a moment? There's actually something I wanted to talk to you about.$s
Entries.event_loveMarnie1: Oh... well, I'm sorry to hear that.$s
Entries.event_loveMarnie2: Ah... so we've both experienced heartache from the same woman, eh?#$b#I'm sorry to hear that, @. Really.$s
Entries.event_loveMarnie3: I-Is that so?$s#$b#Well... I'm glad to hear that.$a
Entries.event_loveMarnie4: I'm not sure Marnie felt the same way...$s
Entries.event_relocate1: Um, yes... We'll get it sorted out when we head down to the front desk.$s#$b#Well, let's get going, then.
Entries.event_relocate2: Certainly.#$b#For now we should head out! We can unpack this evening once we're back from the first round of meetings... And dinner, of course.$h
Entries.event_relocate3: O-oh. I suppose you're right... No need to cause the staff extra trouble on our account.$5#$b#Well... let's head out, shall we? We don't want to be late...$7
Entries.event_ruin1: I'm hungry, too. Let's get going, then. What are you in the mood for?
Entries.event_ruin2: Me too...$s#$b#Well, I know some decent bars here, at least. Let's go.
Entries.event_ruin3: Huh...? Am I okay...?$s#$b#I... I'm just a little taken aback by Lin's behavior.$s#$b#I'll be fine, though...#$b#@... Thank you for being here with me. Let's go get a good dinner.$h

Entries.give_flowersA: Oh my!$h#$b#... I suppose... I accept!$8#$b#... I'm making something official...$h
Entries.give_flowersB: Are you being serious right now?$h#$b#Absolutely. I never would have thought...$8#$b#... I'm making something official...$h
Entries.give_pendant: ...! I...are you serious? Yes!$8#$b#This is too good to be true... $4#$b#I'm so happy. Don't worry, I'll get all the paperwork done for it. Should take about three days.$h
Entries.stardrop_gift: @, my dear, who showed me another way to love.$4#$b#This stardrop, just as rare as you, should be the perfect gift.$h#$b#The old town stories has it it's flavour is legendary.$h
Entries.rejectNPCA: Sorry but I am not comfortable with this situation.$2
Entries.rejectNPCB: Ah, no thank you...#$b#Why don't you get sweet with the younger bunch.$1
Entries.reject_two_heartA: Ah... I don't think I can plant picked flowers.
Entries.reject_two_heartB: This really would be a better gift for one of the more elegible townsfolk.
Entries.reject_four_heartA: I'm afraid I'm married to my job, @.#$b#The mayor cannot have favourites.$2
Entries.reject_four_heartB: Oh... I mean.. well...$3#$b#I think we should just be friends.$7
Entries.engageA: You know I am the one who run the wedding... I am sure you want to go without a hitch...$2
Entries.engageB: You don't have to give this to me... you should of given it to your spouse-to-be.$1
Entries.marriedB: You married %spouse. You shouldn't be out doing this.!$4
Entries.refusal_knownA: Give that to someone you like and I'll help with the wedding.
Entries.refusal_knownB: A pendant... I suppose you've found someone you like.
Entries.refusal_botherA: ... Please do not joke like that.$5
Entries.refusal_botherB: Stop it. I've made myself clear.$5
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: I have eyes elsewhere... besides I don't want the town thinking I pick favorites.

Entries.give_flowersB: Did you know? I love this kind.$8
Entries.engageB: I only need the one, dear.$8
Entries.marriedB: Where are you finding these pendants, dear?$h

Entries.Rainy_Day_Lewis: What nasty weather...#$e#If you need me, I'll be in here.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_Lewis: I made soup for dinner. [199 218 219 727 730]#$e#I'm not as good a cook as Gus, but I hope you like it.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_Lewis: Morning, dear...#$e#I'm barely awake myself. Here, let's hope this helps. [395]
Entries.Indoor_Night_Lewis: Today was a long day...#$e#Paperwork and such.$s#$e#Let's go to sleep soon, dear. I'm exhausted.
Entries.Outdoor_Lewis: Your day starts very early, doesn't it?#$e#I'm not used to waking up quite so early.$h
Entries.spring_Lewis: The whole town seems more lively in the spring. It's refreshing.$h
Entries.summer_Lewis: I don't much like the summer heat...#$e#But I have to put on a happy face for the town.$h
Entries.fall_Lewis: The town looks lovely in fall colors.
Entries.winter_Lewis: The snow is lovely, but it's hard to get around without snowshoes...
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: What nasty weather...#$e#If you need me, I'll be in here.$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Here you go, dear. I made it just a little while ago. [395]
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: What's on your agenda today, dear?#$e#I don't want to go outside in this weather... Good thing I've got some work to do inside.
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: Hmm... what should we do for dinner tonight?
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: I made some soup for dinner. [199 218 219 727 730]#$e#I'm not the best cook, but I hope you like it.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: The rain makes our home seem cozy, doesn't it, dear?$h#$e#Let's turn in for the night.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Make sure you change into something warm, dear. I don't want you to get sick.
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: Let's head to bed early tonight, okay?#$e#You look cold. I'll help warm you up.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Morning, dear...#$e#I'm barely awake myself. Here, let's hope this helps. [395]
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Ah, good morning, honey.#$e#I have some work to do in here today.#$e#If you need anything, you know where I'll be.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: I tried my hand at breakfast, dear. [194 195 210 211 216]#$e#Did it turn out alright? I'm not really a chef...
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: Did you sleep well, dear?#$e#I slept perfectly next to you.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Today was a long day...#$e#Paperwork and such.$s#$e#Let's go to sleep soon, dear. I'm exhausted.
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: I made some dinner. [205 199 224]#$e#What do you think? It turned out okay, don't you think?$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: You know, they never tell you beforehand, but being a mayor is ninety-five percent paperwork... I swear.$s#$e#Anyways... how was your day, honey?
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: The farm is such a relaxing place to be.#$e#I liked living in the center of town, don't get me wrong, but being out here is so peaceful.$h
Entries.Outdoor_0: It's a lovely day today, isn't it, dear?$h#$e#Days like this make work a little more pleasant.
Entries.Outdoor_1: Hi, dear. If you need me to do anything, just ask.#$e#I'll be thinking of you.
Entries.Outdoor_3: Your day starts quite early, doesn't it?#$e#I don't mind it, but I'm not used to waking up so early.$h
Entries.OneKid_0: I wonder if %kid1 will grow up to be a farmer like you?#$e#Or maybe a mayor like me...$h
Entries.OneKid_1: I never thought I'd be a dad.#$e#It's a challenge, but a very welcome one indeed.$h
Entries.OneKid_2: Let's go on a family outing tomorrow, dear. Just you, me, and little %kid1.$h
Entries.TwoKids_0: I can't believe I let you talk me into two kids.$h#$e#I'm overjoyed.$h
Entries.TwoKids_1: We have to make sure and give %kid1 plenty of attention now that we have %kid2. We don't want any jealousy between them.
Entries.TwoKids_2: You're a wonderful father, @.$h^You're a wonderful mother, @.$h
Entries.Good_0: I've never felt this way about anyone before, @. You're amazing.$8
Entries.Good_1: You're looking extra handsome today, dear.$h^You're looking extra lovely today, dear.$h
Entries.Good_2: You work so hard for us both, honey. I appreciate it.
Entries.Good_3: I love you, dear. Don't forget that.
Entries.Good_4: I admit that I never thought I'd be married to the new farmer someday...#$e#Of course, I always thought you were very attractive...$8
Entries.Good_5: I was so nervous when I sent you the letter about the Mermaid's Pendant!#$e#Was it too strong of a hint...?$h
Entries.Neutral_0: The town sure was bustling when I was running errands the other day.#$e#I'm glad to see that.
Entries.Neutral_1: Sometimes I think that this town might be fine without a mayor.
Entries.Neutral_2: Hmm... I'm feeling peckish. I'll grab a snack and get back to work...
Entries.Bad_1: Just... leave me alone! I'm busy, too, for Yoba's sake!$5
Entries.Bad_2: I always thought I was too busy for a relationship...$s#$e#I guess I was right.$s
Entries.funLeave_Lewis: I've got some errands to run today.#$e#Oh, you know... Paperwork to drop off, letters to mail, shopkeepers to check in with.$h
Entries.funReturn_Lewis: Hello, dear. I'm glad to be back.$h
Entries.spring_1: Happy new year, honey!#$e#Here's to a great year together.$h
Entries.spring_12: Sometimes I wish I could participate in the egg hunt.#$e#I'm sure I'd be awful at it, anyway.$h
Entries.spring_23: Of course I know the dance! I'm the mayor... it's my job to know all the town's traditions!
Entries.summer_1: Phew... it's like it just got hot overnight.
Entries.summer_10: Sorry if I seem a little scrambled, dear...#$e#I'm preparing for the governor's visit tomorrow.
Entries.summer_27: The moon jellies will make their appearance tomorrow.#$e#I've seen it so many times, but it's still a lovely sight each year.
Entries.fall_1: Ah... it's finally cooling off.#$e#I love the fall. It's a great season for relaxing and eating good food.
Entries.fall_15: So much preparation goes into the fair each year.#$e#There are a lot of behind-the-scenes things that the average villager never sees.
Entries.fall_26: He doesn't really want anyone to know, but I'll let you in on a little secret...#$e#The Wizard has a pretty large part in tomorrow's festivities. He helps out every year.$h
Entries.winter_1: Oh, it snowed last night!#$e#How strange, I don't remember seeing any in the forecast...#$e#I guess winter's finally here.
Entries.winter_7: Will you enter the fishing content tomorrow, dear?#$e#You always do so well.
Entries.winter_24: I hope you have your gift prepared for tomorrow, honey.
Entries.winter_28: Ah, the year is finally coming to a close.#$e#Let's drink. [346]
Entries.spouseRoom_Lewis: #$c .5#I've got some paperwork to do today.#$e#I got a good start this morning before you woke up, but I'm nowhere near finished.
Entries.patio_Lewis: I'm glad I still have time to garden.$h

Entries.marriage_Mon.000: Hello, dear. I'm here to check in with Pierre... and do some grocery shopping.$h
Entries.marriage_Mon.001: Robin's business is booming as usual.
Entries.marriage_Wed.000: Oh, hi, dear! I'm here checking on Marnie's business.
Entries.marriage_Wed.001: Willy's shop sure is in a peaceful place.$h
Entries.marriage_Fri.000: I always like coming to check on the library. It's a nice, quiet place.
Entries.marriage_Fri.001: I'm here to collect Clint's business tax.
Entries.marriage_Fri.002: I'm glad you're here, honey! Grab a drink and let's dance.$h

Entries.Lewis0: I may be mayor of Pelican Town, but you've become mayor of my heart, @.$h
Entries.Lewis1: I'm overjoyed!$h#$e#I just can't help but wonder... who will perform the ceremony?
